subject: Football
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: An N.F.L. official will meet with Minnesota Vikings quarterback Brett Favre next week as part of an investigation into allegations that Favre sent racy text messages and lewd photographs to a Jets game hostess in 2008.
snippet: An N.F.L. official will meet with Minnesota Vikings quarterback Brett Favre next week as part of an investigation into allegations that Favre sent racy text messages and lewd photographs to a Jets game hostess in 2008.
